raw_comment:
I notice that a majority of the players are of color but very few coaches are of color. 
I wonder What stops these women to become coaches after their sporting careers. I wonder if many of the people paying for these sports to happen do not want to see people of color in charge. 
This impacts my community because While I get to see representation of myself, there is still not enough representation of coaches that are people of color.
This graph shows the disparities of people of color in higher positions in sports legues. 
A catchy headline could be “Women of Color Need More Representation High Up in Sports leagues.”
ace_sentences: Most players are people of color.
Few coaches are people of color.
I wonder what stops these women from becoming coaches after their sporting careers.
I wonder if many people who pay for these sports do not want people of color to be in charge.
In my community, I see representation of myself.
However, there is not enough representation of coaches who are people of color.
This graph shows disparities in sports leagues.
The disparities concern people of color in higher positions.
The headline is: Women of Color Need More Representation High Up in Sports Leagues.
